summary: Just a quick Mod I threw together from a request on the forums.
descriptionHtml:
Same power as Auriels bow from the Dawnguard expansion.
The power will block the sun for 2min, useful for evil characters or vampires.

REQUIRES DAWNGUARD!

I don\'t use this mod, so will only be updating it if bugs are found or requests are made.

- Location - 
The book is found on one of the tables in the vampire castles main room. (on the right hand side)

--------------------

thrown together in less than 10 mins, so may be buggy, I have done a quick test.
author: Redarrow141
